item.title: LSTM, a special RNN
item.description: What exactly are the LSTM layer, cell, neuron, unit? The number of units is the number of neurons in a layer. The number of units defines the dimension of the hidden states. The dimension of the cell state is the same as that of the hidden state. In the following, I will use $h$ for the length of hidden states – the number of hidden units. It’s called hidden_size in PyTorch and num_units in Tensorflow.
